sources.title: Porky's Midnight Matinee (1941)
sources.description: Porky’s Midnight Matinee is a Warner Bros. Looney Tunes cartoon directed by Chuck Jones. The short was released on November 22, 1941, and stars Porky Pig. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/porkys-midnight-matinee-1941/

sources.title: Porky's Midnight Matinee (1941)
sources.description: Porky is a custodian at a theater where various types of entertainers perform. During the night, he gets curious about a trained African Pygmy ant who calls him over to his cage. Naturally, Porky ends up letting the ant escape, and he has to track it back down again. Recorded from Tooncast Latin America

metadata.Plot: Working backstage at a theater, Porky frees a little ant he finds in a cage, only to learn that it's a rare and valuable trained pygmy ant.
